predicate.note: Frames file for 'prosecute' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

roleset.name: try a case, offensively

role.descr: case, or defendant of that case

example.name: prosecute a case
example.text: The units are autonomous from U.S. attorneys' offices and focus exclusively on *trace* prosecuting organized-crime cases.

example.name: prosecute a person
example.text: Opponents say Mr. Thornburgh's plan will needlessly break up longtime, tightly knit crime-fighting units that *traec* have successfully prosecuted major organized-crime figures.
example.arg: *trace* -> that -> longtime, tightly knit crime-fighting units

roleset.note: These two examples demonstrate the interchangeability of the case and the person in that case.

example.name: with law
example.text: Mrs. Yeargin was fired and prosecuted *trace* under an unusual South Carolina law that makes it a crime to breach test security.
example.arg: an unusual South Carolina law that makes it a crime to breach test security
